H0.text: who was stephen r covey. Business Consultant

H1.text: who was stephen r covey. Motivational Speaker

H2.text: who was stephen r covey. Professor

H3.text: who was stephen r covey. Author

A4.text: He was a professor at the Jon M. Huntsman School of Business at Utah State University (USU) at the time of his death.

A5.text: He authored several devotional works for Latter-day Saint readers, including Spiritual Roots of Human Relations (1970).

A6.text: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People is a business and self-help book written by Stephen R. Covey.

A7.text: Upon Covey's death in 2012, the book had sold more than 20 million copies.
